content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No structures have been successfully placed on the map. Although several recovery updates attempted to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), all placement and crafting attempts failed due to inventory and resource shortages. No connected assemblies (such as production furnaces or labs) were confirmed on the map.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Usage Errors – When calling get_entities(), avoid unexpected keywords (like “radius”) or extra positional arguments. Verify and follow the correct function signature to prevent TypeErrors.
• Null Value Handling – Always check that a query’s return value is not None before iterating over it to avoid “NoneType” errors.
• Lab Placement Verification – Before attempting to place a Lab (e.g., at (0.5, 2.5)), confirm that the Lab item exists in inventory; otherwise, placement will fail.
• Resource Chain Shortages – Lab crafting failures arose from missing sub-ingredients (iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables, etc.). Ensure that intermediate products (such as iron plates for iron-gear-wheels and copper plates for copper cables) are produced in sufficient quantity before initiating Lab production.
• Production Consistency – Reassess and balance resource inputs (via smelting or other production steps) to maintain a steady supply of required components and avoid repeated crafting deficits.
